#Validations

#Measure description from the input file is different from expected

query1 = f"""WITH srce AS (
  SELECT LINE_NUM, EXTRN_CODE, EXTRN_NAME, MEASR_NAME, MEASR_DESC, mil.MEASR_ID  FROM tier1_measr_mtrlz_tbl srce
  JOIN MM_MEASR_ID_LKP mil ON mil.EXTRN_MEASR_ID = srce.EXTRN_CODE
  JOIN MM_MEASR_LKP ml ON mil.MEASR_ID = ml.MEASR_ID AND ml.use_ind='Y' AND mil.VENDR_ID = {tier1_vendr_id}  
),
input_msr AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT srce.EXTRN_CODE FROM tier1_measr_mtrlz_tbl srce
  JOIN MM_MEASR_ID_LKP mil ON mil.EXTRN_MEASR_ID = srce.EXTRN_CODE
  JOIN MM_MEASR_LKP ml ON mil.MEASR_ID = ml.MEASR_ID AND ml.use_ind='Y' AND mil.VENDR_ID = {tier1_vendr_id}
),
msr_last_existing_run AS (
SELECT EXTRN_MEASR_ID, EXTRN_MEASR_NAME, RUN_ID FROM (
SELECT rp.*,
  row_number() over(PARTITION BY extrn_measr_id ORDER BY rp.run_id DESC) rn
  FROM mm_run_measr_plc rp
  JOIN dpf_all_run_vw r
  ON r.run_id = rp.run_id
  JOIN mm_cntrt_lkp c
  ON c.prcsg_id = r.prcsg_id
  WHERE r.run_sttus_id = 4 AND c.cntrt_id =  {tier1_cntrt_id}
  )
WHERE rn = 1
),
new_msrs AS (
  SELECT input_msr.EXTRN_CODE FROM input_msr
  LEFT JOIN msr_last_existing_run ON input_msr.EXTRN_CODE = msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_ID
  WHERE msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_ID IS NULL
)
SELECT DISTINCT LINE_NUM as dq1_line_num, EXTRN_CODE as dq1_extrn_code, EXTRN_NAME AS dq1_dscr, msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_NAME dq1_measr_name, MEASR_DESC as dq1_measr_desc 
FROM srce 
JOIN msr_last_existing_run ON srce.EXTRN_CODE = msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_ID 
WHERE srce.EXTRN_NAME <> msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_NAME
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT LINE_NUM, srce.EXTRN_CODE, EXTRN_NAME AS DSCR, 'N/A' AS MEASR_NAME, MEASR_DESC
FROM srce
JOIN new_msrs ON srce.EXTRN_CODE = new_msrs.EXTRN_CODE"""
df_inp_diff_exp = spark.sql(query1)


# Modified market description

query2 = f"""WITH srce AS (
  SELECT input.LINE_NUM, input.EXTRN_CODE, input.EXTRN_NAME, input.MKT_SKID_1 as mkt_skid, mkt.MKT_DESC FROM tier1_mkt_dsdim input             
  JOIN mm_mkt_dim mkt ON mkt.mkt_skid = input.mkt_skid_1
  AND mkt.srce_sys_id = input.srce_sys_id
  AND (mkt.cntrt_id =0) AND 'TP' = '{tier1_fact_type_code}' 
),
input_mkt AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT input.EXTRN_CODE FROM tier1_mkt_dsdim input  
  JOIN mm_mkt_dim mkt ON mkt.mkt_skid = input.mkt_skid_1
  AND mkt.srce_sys_id = input.srce_sys_id
  AND (mkt.cntrt_id =0) AND 'TP' = '{tier1_fact_type_code}'
),
mkt_last_existing_run AS (
SELECT EXTRN_MKT_ID, EXTRN_MKT_NAME, RUN_ID FROM (
SELECT rp.*,row_number() over(PARTITION BY extrn_mkt_id ORDER BY rp.run_id DESC) rn
  FROM mm_run_mkt_plc rp
  JOIN dpf_all_run_vw r
  ON r.run_id = rp.run_id
  JOIN mm_cntrt_lkp c
  ON c.prcsg_id = r.prcsg_id
  WHERE r.run_sttus_id = 4 AND c.cntrt_id =  {tier1_cntrt_id}
  )
WHERE rn = 1
),
new_mkt AS (
  SELECT input_mkt.EXTRN_CODE FROM input_mkt 
  LEFT JOIN mkt_last_existing_run ON input_mkt.EXTRN_CODE = mkt_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MKT_ID
  WHERE mkt_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MKT_ID IS NULL
)
SELECT DISTINCT LINE_NUM as dq2_line_num, EXTRN_CODE as dq2_extrn_code, EXTRN_NAME as dq2_extrn_name, mkt_last_existing_run.extrn_mkt_name as dq2_mkt_name, mkt_desc as dq2_mkt_desc
FROM srce 
JOIN mkt_last_existing_run ON srce.EXTRN_CODE = mkt_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MKT_ID 
WHERE srce.EXTRN_NAME <> mkt_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MKT_NAME
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT LINE_NUM, srce.EXTRN_CODE, EXTRN_NAME, 'N/A' AS mkt_name, mkt_desc 
FROM srce
JOIN new_mkt ON srce.EXTRN_CODE = new_mkt.EXTRN_CODE"""

df_mod_mkt_desc = spark.sql(query2)


# Create mm_time_perd_assoc_tier1_vw
query = """with CAL_TYPE_2 as (
SELECT   2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_A,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_B,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,
          TB.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          TB.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          tb.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_b,
          tb.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_b,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_a,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_a,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_a,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_a
     FROM mm_time_perd_assoc assoc
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim ta ON ta.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_a
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tb ON tb.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_b
          JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_type asty
             ON asty.time_perd_assoc_type_id = assoc.time_perd_assoc_type_id
     WHERE assoc.CAL_TYPE_ID=2),
BIMTH_2_MTH AS (
 SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_B TIME_PERD_ID_A,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_A TIME_PERD_ID_B,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B,
          TB.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          TB.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_a,
          tb.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_A,
          tb.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_A
     FROM mm_time_perd_assoc assoc
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim ta ON ta.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_a
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tb ON tb.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_b
          JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_type asty
             ON asty.time_perd_assoc_type_id = assoc.time_perd_assoc_type_id
    WHERE
    (TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('EB','OB')   AND TB.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE = 'MTH' AND TB.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE = 'MH')
 AND assoc.CAL_TYPE_ID =2 AND assoc.TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID=1
),
MTH_2_BIMTH AS (
 SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_A ,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_B ,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_A,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_A,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_A,
          TB.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          TB.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          tb.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          tb.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B
     FROM mm_time_perd_assoc assoc
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim ta ON ta.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_a
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tb ON tb.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_b
          JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_type asty
             ON asty.time_perd_assoc_type_id = assoc.time_perd_assoc_type_id
    WHERE
    (TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('EB','OB')   AND TB.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE = 'MTH' AND TB.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE = 'MH')
 AND assoc.CAL_TYPE_ID =2 AND assoc.TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID=1
),

BW_2_EB AS (SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_A,
          ta.TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_B,
          1 TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_CLASS_COD TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_END_DATE TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_START_DATE TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A
     FROM mm_time_perd_fdim ta
    WHERE
    TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('BW') AND  TA.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE ='EB'
    ),

BW_2_MTH AS (SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          ta.ODD_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_A,
          ta.TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_B,
          1 TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B,
          ta.MTH_TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          ta.MTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,
          ta.MTH_END_DATE TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
          ta.MTH_START_DATE TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A
               FROM mm_time_perd_fdim ta
    WHERE
    TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('BW') AND  TA.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE ='MTH'
    )
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
TIME_PERD_ID_B,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_B,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_B
FROM CAL_TYPE_2
UNION
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
TIME_PERD_ID_B,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_B,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_B
FROM BIMTH_2_MTH
UNION
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
TIME_PERD_ID_B,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_B,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_B
FROM BW_2_EB
UNION
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID, CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
TIME_PERD_ID_B,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_B,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_B
FROM BW_2_MTH
UNION
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
TIME_PERD_ID_B,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_B,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_B
FROM MTH_2_BIMTH"""

df = spark.sql(query)

df.createOrReplaceTempView("mm_time_perd_assoc_tier1_vw")

# Missing product
query3 = f"""WITH curr_run
     AS (SELECT /*+ materialize */ DISTINCT CASE 
       WHEN tf.time_perd_class_code IN ('MTH') THEN tf.time_perd_end_date 
       ELSE ta.time_perd_end_date_a END time_perd_end_date,
       3 srce_Sys_id,
       {tier1_cntrt_id} cntrt_id,
       '{tier1_fact_type_code}' fact_type_code,
       '{tier1_categ_id}' prod_prttn_code
           FROM tier1_time_mtrlz_tbl st JOIN mm_time_perd_id_lkp l ON 
           l.extrn_time_perd_id = st.extrn_code and l.vendr_id={tier1_vendr_id}
           JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tf on tf.time_perd_id = l.time_perd_id
           LEFT OUTER JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_tier1_vw ta ON ta.time_perd_id_b = tf.time_perd_id
           AND ta.time_perd_type_code_b = tf.time_perd_type_code
           AND ta.time_perd_type_code_a = 'MH'
           
           ),
     all_finished_run
     AS (SELECT *
           FROM mm_run_prttn_plc plc
                JOIN dpf_all_run_vw run ON run.run_id = plc.run_id
          WHERE     plc.cntrt_id = {tier1_cntrt_id}
                AND plc.time_perd_class_code = 'MTH'
                AND run.run_sttus_id = 4),
     time_perd_before
     AS (SELECT MAX (mm_time_perd_end_date) mm_time_perd_end_date,
                MAX (srce_sys_id) srce_sys_id,
                MAX (cntrt_id) cntrt_id,
                MAX (fact_Type_code) fact_Type_code,
                MAX (prod_prttn_code) prod_prttn_code
           FROM all_finished_run
          WHERE mm_time_perd_end_date <
                   (SELECT MIN (time_perd_end_date)
                      FROM curr_run 
                                ) 
                                ),
     time_perds 
     AS (  SELECT /*+ materialize */ * FROM (
                 SELECT time_perd_end_date AS mm_time_perd_end_date, 
                        srce_sys_id,
                        cntrt_id,
                        fact_type_code,
                        prod_prttn_code
                 FROM curr_run
               UNION ALL
                 SELECT mm_time_perd_end_date,
                        srce_sys_id, 
                        cntrt_id,
                        fact_type_code, 
                        prod_prttn_code  
                 FROM time_perd_before
            )
          ),
     loaded_prod
     AS (SELECT /*+ materialize parallel(8) */
                DISTINCT prod_skid
           FROM mm_tp_mth_fct fct
                JOIN time_perds tp
                   ON     fct.mm_time_perd_end_date =
                             tp.mm_time_perd_end_date
                      AND fct.srce_sys_id = tp.srce_sys_id
                      AND fct.cntrt_id = tp.cntrt_id
                      AND fct.fact_Type_code = tp.fact_Type_code
                      AND fct.prod_prttn_code = tp.prod_prttn_code),
     xref
     AS (SELECT mm_prod_xref.*
           FROM mm_prod_xref inner join (SELECT DISTINCT srce_sys_id, cntrt_id FROM curr_run) distinct_curr_run on 
          mm_prod_xref.srce_sys_id = distinct_curr_run.srce_sys_id and mm_prod_xref.cntrt_id = distinct_curr_run.cntrt_id
         )
SELECT xref.extrn_prod_id as dq3_extrn_prod_id , xref.extrn_prod_name as dq3_extrn_prod_name , xref.extrn_prod_attr_val_list as dq3_extrn_prod_attr_val_list , xref.prod_match_attr_list as dq3_prod_match_attr_list , xref.prod_prttn_code as dq3_prod_prttn_code , xref.prod_skid as dq3_prod_skid , xref.srce_sys_id as dq3_srce_sys_id , xref.cntrt_id as dq3_cntrt_id
  FROM xref
       JOIN loaded_prod ON xref.prod_skid = loaded_prod.prod_skid
       LEFT OUTER JOIN tier1_prod_dsdim prod_cur
          ON loaded_prod.prod_skid = prod_cur.prod_skid
       WHERE prod_cur.prod_skid IS  NULL
	   LIMIT 1"""

# Missing product
query3 = f"""WITH curr_run
     AS (SELECT /*+ materialize */ DISTINCT CASE 
       WHEN tf.time_perd_class_code IN ('MTH') THEN tf.time_perd_end_date 
       ELSE ta.time_perd_end_date_a END time_perd_end_date,
       3 srce_Sys_id,
       {tier1_cntrt_id} cntrt_id,
       '{tier1_fact_type_code}' fact_type_code,
       '{tier1_categ_id}' prod_prttn_code
           FROM tier1_time_mtrlz_tbl st JOIN mm_time_perd_id_lkp l ON 
           l.extrn_time_perd_id = st.extrn_code and l.vendr_id={tier1_vendr_id}
           JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tf on tf.time_perd_id = l.time_perd_id
           LEFT OUTER JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_tier1_vw ta ON ta.time_perd_id_b = tf.time_perd_id
           AND ta.time_perd_type_code_b = tf.time_perd_type_code
           AND ta.time_perd_type_code_a = 'MH'
           
           ),
     all_finished_run
     AS (SELECT *
           FROM mm_run_prttn_plc plc
                JOIN dpf_all_run_vw run ON run.run_id = plc.run_id
          WHERE     plc.cntrt_id = {tier1_cntrt_id}
                AND plc.time_perd_class_code = 'MTH'
                AND run.run_sttus_id = 4),
     time_perd_before
     AS (SELECT MAX (mm_time_perd_end_date) mm_time_perd_end_date,
                MAX (srce_sys_id) srce_sys_id,
                MAX (cntrt_id) cntrt_id,
                MAX (fact_Type_code) fact_Type_code,
                MAX (prod_prttn_code) prod_prttn_code
           FROM all_finished_run
          WHERE mm_time_perd_end_date <
                   (SELECT MIN (time_perd_end_date)
                      FROM curr_run 
                                ) 
                                ),
     time_perds 
     AS (  SELECT /*+ materialize */ * FROM (
                 SELECT time_perd_end_date AS mm_time_perd_end_date, 
                        srce_sys_id,
                        cntrt_id,
                        fact_type_code,
                        prod_prttn_code
                 FROM curr_run
               UNION ALL
                 SELECT mm_time_perd_end_date,
                        srce_sys_id, 
                        cntrt_id,
                        fact_type_code, 
                        prod_prttn_code  
                 FROM time_perd_before
            )
          ),
     loaded_prod
     AS (SELECT /*+ materialize parallel(8) */
                DISTINCT prod_skid
           FROM mm_tp_mth_fct fct
                JOIN time_perds tp
                   ON     fct.mm_time_perd_end_date =
                             tp.mm_time_perd_end_date
                      AND fct.srce_sys_id = tp.srce_sys_id
                      AND fct.cntrt_id = tp.cntrt_id
                      AND fct.fact_Type_code = tp.fact_Type_code
                      AND fct.prod_prttn_code = tp.prod_prttn_code),
     xref
     AS (SELECT mm_prod_xref.*
           FROM mm_prod_xref inner join (SELECT DISTINCT srce_sys_id, cntrt_id FROM curr_run) distinct_curr_run on 
          mm_prod_xref.srce_sys_id = distinct_curr_run.srce_sys_id and mm_prod_xref.cntrt_id = distinct_curr_run.cntrt_id
         )
SELECT (3) as DQ, xref.extrn_prod_id as extrn_prod_id , xref.extrn_prod_name as extrn_prod_name , xref.extrn_prod_attr_val_list as extrn_prod_attr_val_list , xref.prod_match_attr_list as prod_match_attr_list , xref.prod_prttn_code as prod_prttn_code , xref.prod_skid as prod_skid , xref.srce_sys_id as srce_sys_id , xref.cntrt_id as cntrt_id
  FROM xref
       JOIN loaded_prod ON xref.prod_skid = loaded_prod.prod_skid
       LEFT OUTER JOIN tier1_prod_dsdim prod_cur
          ON loaded_prod.prod_skid = prod_cur.prod_skid
       WHERE prod_cur.prod_skid IS  NULL
	   LIMIT 1"""
df_miss_prod = spark.sql(query3)

),
msr_last_existing_run AS (

),
new_msrs AS (

)

),

BW_2_EB AS (SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_A,
          ta.TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_B,
          1 TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_CLASS_COD TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_END_DATE TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_START_DATE TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A
     FROM mm_time_perd_fdim ta
    WHERE
    TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('BW') AND  TA.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE ='EB'
    ),

BW_2_MTH AS (SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          ta.ODD_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_A,
          ta.TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_B,
          1 TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B,
          ta.MTH_TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          ta.MTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,
          ta.MTH_END_DATE TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
          ta.MTH_START_DATE TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A
               FROM mm_time_perd_fdim ta
    WHERE
    TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('BW') AND  TA.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE ='MTH'
    )
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
TIME_PERD_ID_B,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_B,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_B
FROM CAL_TYPE_2
UNION
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
TIME_PERD_ID_B,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_B,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_B
FROM BIMTH_2_MTH
UNION
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
TIME_PERD_ID_B,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_B,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_B
FROM BW_2_EB
UNION
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID, CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,

FROM MTH_2_BIMTH"""

# Missing product
query3 = f"""WITH curr_run
     AS (SELECT /*+ materialize */ DISTINCT CASE 
       WHEN tf.time_perd_class_code IN ('MTH') THEN tf.time_perd_end_date 
       ELSE ta.time_perd_end_date_a END time_perd_end_date,
       3 srce_Sys_id,
       {tier1_cntrt_id} cntrt_id,
       '{tier1_fact_type_code}' fact_type_code,
       '{tier1_categ_id}' prod_prttn_code
           FROM tier1_time_mtrlz_tbl st JOIN mm_time_perd_id_lkp l ON 
           l.extrn_time_perd_id = st.extrn_code and l.vendr_id={tier1_vendr_id}
           JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tf on tf.time_perd_id = l.time_perd_id
           LEFT OUTER JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_tier1_vw ta ON ta.time_perd_id_b = tf.time_perd_id
           AND ta.time_perd_type_code_b = tf.time_perd_type_code
           AND ta.time_perd_type_code_a = 'MH'
           
           ),
     all_finished_run
     AS (SELECT *
           FROM mm_run_prttn_plc plc
                JOIN dpf_all_run_vw run ON run.run_id = plc.run_id
          WHERE     plc.cntrt_id = {tier1_cntrt_id}
                AND plc.time_perd_class_code = 'MTH'
                AND run.run_sttus_id = 4),
     time_perd_before
     AS (SELECT MAX (mm_time_perd_end_date) mm_time_perd_end_date,
                MAX (srce_sys_id) srce_sys_id,
                MAX (cntrt_id) cntrt_id,
                MAX (fact_Type_code) fact_Type_code,
                MAX (prod_prttn_code) prod_prttn_code
           FROM all_finished_run
          WHERE mm_time_perd_end_date <
                   (SELECT MIN (time_perd_end_date)
                      FROM curr_run 
                                ) 
                                ),
     time_perds 
     AS (  SELECT /*+ materialize */ * FROM (
                 SELECT time_perd_end_date AS mm_time_perd_end_date, 
                        srce_sys_id,
                        cntrt_id,
                        fact_type_code,
                        prod_prttn_code
                 FROM curr_run
               UNION ALL
                 SELECT mm_time_perd_end_date,
                        srce_sys_id, 
                        cntrt_id,
                        fact_type_code, 
                        prod_prttn_code  
                 FROM time_perd_before
            )
          ),
     loaded_prod
     AS (SELECT /*+ materialize parallel(8) */
                DISTINCT prod_skid
           FROM mm_tp_mth_fct fct
                JOIN time_perds tp
                   ON     fct.mm_time_perd_end_date =
                             tp.mm_time_perd_end_date
                      AND fct.srce_sys_id = tp.srce_sys_id
                      AND fct.cntrt_id = tp.cntrt_id
                      AND fct.fact_Type_code = tp.fact_Type_code
                      AND fct.prod_prttn_code = tp.prod_prttn_code),
     xref
     AS (SELECT mm_prod_xref.*
           FROM mm_prod_xref inner join (SELECT DISTINCT srce_sys_id, cntrt_id FROM curr_run) distinct_curr_run on 
          mm_prod_xref.srce_sys_id = distinct_curr_run.srce_sys_id and mm_prod_xref.cntrt_id = distinct_curr_run.cntrt_id
         )
SELECT ('Missing product') as DQ, xref.extrn_prod_id as extrn_prod_id , xref.extrn_prod_name as extrn_prod_name , xref.extrn_prod_attr_val_list as extrn_prod_attr_val_list , xref.prod_match_attr_list as prod_match_attr_list , xref.prod_prttn_code as prod_prttn_code , xref.prod_skid as prod_skid , xref.srce_sys_id as srce_sys_id , xref.cntrt_id as cntrt_id
  FROM xref
       JOIN loaded_prod ON xref.prod_skid = loaded_prod.prod_skid
       LEFT OUTER JOIN tier1_prod_dsdim prod_cur
          ON loaded_prod.prod_skid = prod_cur.prod_skid
       WHERE prod_cur.prod_skid IS  NULL
	   LIMIT 1"""
df_miss_prod = spark.sql(query3)

query1 = f"""WITH srce AS (
  SELECT LINE_NUM, EXTRN_CODE, EXTRN_NAME, MEASR_NAME, MEASR_DESC, mil.MEASR_ID  FROM tier1_measr_mtrlz_tbl srce
  JOIN MM_MEASR_ID_LKP mil ON mil.EXTRN_MEASR_ID = srce.EXTRN_CODE  and mil.fact_type_code in ('TP', '[U]')
  JOIN MM_MEASR_LKP ml ON mil.MEASR_ID = ml.MEASR_ID AND ml.use_ind='Y' AND mil.VENDR_ID = {tier1_vendr_id}  
),
input_msr AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT srce.EXTRN_CODE FROM tier1_measr_mtrlz_tbl srce
  JOIN MM_MEASR_ID_LKP mil ON mil.EXTRN_MEASR_ID = srce.EXTRN_CODE  and mil.fact_type_code in ('TP', '[U]')
  JOIN MM_MEASR_LKP ml ON mil.MEASR_ID = ml.MEASR_ID AND ml.use_ind='Y' AND mil.VENDR_ID = {tier1_vendr_id}
),
msr_last_existing_run AS (
SELECT EXTRN_MEASR_ID, EXTRN_MEASR_NAME, RUN_ID FROM (
SELECT rp.*,
  row_number() over(PARTITION BY extrn_measr_id ORDER BY rp.run_id DESC) rn
  FROM mm_run_measr_plc rp
  JOIN dpf_all_run_vw r
  ON r.run_id = cast(rp.run_id as decimal(38,10))
  JOIN mm_cntrt_lkp c
  ON c.cntrt_id = r.prcsg_id
  WHERE r.run_sttus_id in('COMPLETED', 'FINISHED') AND c.cntrt_id =  {tier1_cntrt_id}
  )
WHERE rn = 1
),
new_msrs AS (
  SELECT input_msr.EXTRN_CODE FROM input_msr
  LEFT JOIN msr_last_existing_run ON input_msr.EXTRN_CODE = msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_ID
  WHERE msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_ID IS NULL
)
SELECT DISTINCT ('Measure description from the input file is different from expected') as DQ, LINE_NUM , EXTRN_CODE , EXTRN_NAME AS DSCR, msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_NAME measr_name, MEASR_DESC
FROM srce 
JOIN msr_last_existing_run ON srce.EXTRN_CODE = msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_ID 
WHERE srce.EXTRN_NAME <> msr_last_existing_run.EXTRN_MEASR_NAME
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT ('Measure description from the input file is different from expected') as DQ, LINE_NUM, srce.EXTRN_CODE, EXTRN_NAME AS DSCR, 'N/A' AS MEASR_NAME, MEASR_DESC
FROM srce
JOIN new_msrs ON srce.EXTRN_CODE = new_msrs.EXTRN_CODE"""
df_inp_diff_exp = spark.sql(query1)

),
mkt_last_existing_run AS (
SELECT EXTRN_MKT_ID, EXTRN_MKT_NAME, RUN_ID FROM (

  FROM mm_run_mkt_plc rp

),
new_mkt AS (

)

JOIN new_mkt ON srce.EXTRN_CODE = new_mkt.EXTRN_CODE"""

          tb.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_b,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_a,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_a,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_a,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_a
     FROM mm_time_perd_assoc assoc
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim ta ON ta.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_a
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tb ON tb.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_b
          JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_type asty
             ON asty.time_perd_assoc_type_id = assoc.time_perd_assoc_type_id
     WHERE assoc.CAL_TYPE_ID=2),
BIMTH_2_MTH AS (
 SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_B TIME_PERD_ID_A,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_A TIME_PERD_ID_B,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B,
          TB.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          TB.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_a,
          tb.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_A,
          tb.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_A
     FROM mm_time_perd_assoc assoc
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim ta ON ta.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_a
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tb ON tb.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_b
          JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_type asty
             ON asty.time_perd_assoc_type_id = assoc.time_perd_assoc_type_id
    WHERE
    (TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('EB','OB')   AND TB.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE = 'MTH' AND TB.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE = 'MH')
 AND assoc.CAL_TYPE_ID =2 AND assoc.TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID=1
),
MTH_2_BIMTH AS (
 SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_A ,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ID_B ,
          assoc.TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_A,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_A,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_A,
          TB.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          TB.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          tb.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          tb.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B
     FROM mm_time_perd_assoc assoc
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim ta ON ta.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_a
          JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tb ON tb.time_perd_id = assoc.time_perd_id_b
          JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_type asty
             ON asty.time_perd_assoc_type_id = assoc.time_perd_assoc_type_id
    WHERE
    (TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('EB','OB')   AND TB.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE = 'MTH' AND TB.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE = 'MH')
 AND assoc.CAL_TYPE_ID =2 AND assoc.TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID=1
),

BW_2_EB AS (SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_A,
          ta.TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_B,
          1 TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_CLASS_COD TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_END_DATE TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
          ta.EVEN_BIMTH_START_DATE TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A
     FROM mm_time_perd_fdim ta
    WHERE
    TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('BW') AND  TA.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE ='EB'
    ),

BW_2_MTH AS (SELECT  2 CAL_TYPE_ID,
          ta.ODD_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_A,
          ta.TIME_PERD_ID TIME_PERD_ID_B,
          1 TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID ,
          ta.TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,
          ta.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_type_CODE_B,
          ta.time_perd_end_date time_perd_end_date_B,
          ta.time_perd_start_date time_perd_start_date_B,
          ta.MTH_TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,
          ta.MTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,
          ta.MTH_END_DATE TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
          ta.MTH_START_DATE TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A
               FROM mm_time_perd_fdim ta
    WHERE
    TA.TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE in ('BW') AND  TA.EVEN_BIMTH_TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE ='MTH'
    )
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,
TIME_PERD_ID_B,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_B,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_B,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_B
FROM CAL_TYPE_2
UNION
SELECT TIME_PERD_ASSOC_TYPE_ID,CAL_TYPE_ID ,TIME_PERD_ID_A,TIME_PERD_CLASS_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_TYPE_CODE_A,TIME_PERD_START_DATE_A,TIME_PERD_END_DATE_A,

# Missing product
query3 = f"""WITH curr_run
     AS (SELECT /*+ materialize */ DISTINCT CASE 
       WHEN tf.time_perd_class_code IN ('{time_perd_class_code}') THEN tf.time_perd_end_date 
       ELSE ta.time_perd_end_date_a END time_perd_end_date,
       3 srce_Sys_id,
       {tier1_cntrt_id} cntrt_id,
       '{tier1_fact_type_code}' fact_type_code,
       '{tier1_categ_id}' prod_prttn_code
           FROM tier1_time_mtrlz_tbl st JOIN mm_time_perd_id_lkp l ON 
           l.extrn_time_perd_id = st.extrn_code and l.vendr_id={tier1_vendr_id}
           JOIN mm_time_perd_fdim tf on tf.time_perd_id = l.time_perd_id
           LEFT OUTER JOIN mm_time_perd_assoc_tier1_vw ta ON ta.time_perd_id_b = tf.time_perd_id
           AND ta.time_perd_type_code_b = tf.time_perd_type_code
           AND ta.time_perd_type_code_a = '{time_perd_type_code}'
           
           ),
     all_finished_run
     AS (SELECT *
           FROM mm_run_prttn_plc plc
                JOIN dpf_all_run_vw run ON cast(run.run_id  as decimal(38,10)) = cast(plc.run_id as decimal(38,10))
          WHERE     plc.cntrt_id = {tier1_cntrt_id}
                AND plc.time_perd_class_code = '{time_perd_class_code}'
                AND run.run_sttus_id IN ('COMPLETED', 'FINISHED')),
     time_perd_before
     AS (SELECT MAX (mm_time_perd_end_date) mm_time_perd_end_date,
                MAX (srce_sys_id) srce_sys_id,
                MAX (cntrt_id) cntrt_id,
                MAX (fact_Type_code) fact_Type_code,
                MAX (prod_prttn_code) prod_prttn_code
           FROM all_finished_run
          WHERE mm_time_perd_end_date <
                   (SELECT MIN (time_perd_end_date)
                      FROM curr_run 
                                ) 
                                ),
     time_perds 
     AS (  SELECT /*+ materialize */ * FROM (
                 SELECT time_perd_end_date AS mm_time_perd_end_date, 
                        srce_sys_id,
                        cntrt_id,
                        fact_type_code,
                        prod_prttn_code
                 FROM curr_run
               UNION ALL
                 SELECT mm_time_perd_end_date,
                        srce_sys_id, 
                        cntrt_id,
                        fact_type_code, 
                        prod_prttn_code  
                 FROM time_perd_before
            )
          ),
     loaded_prod
     AS (SELECT /*+ materialize parallel(8) */
                DISTINCT prod_skid
           FROM mm_tp_mth_fct fct
                JOIN time_perds tp
                   ON     fct.mm_time_perd_end_date =
                             tp.mm_time_perd_end_date
                      AND fct.srce_sys_id = tp.srce_sys_id
                      AND fct.cntrt_id = tp.cntrt_id
                      AND fct.fact_Type_code = tp.fact_Type_code
                      AND fct.prod_prttn_code = tp.prod_prttn_code),
     xref
     AS (SELECT mm_prod_xref.*
           FROM mm_prod_xref inner join (SELECT DISTINCT srce_sys_id, cntrt_id FROM curr_run) distinct_curr_run on 
          mm_prod_xref.srce_sys_id = distinct_curr_run.srce_sys_id and mm_prod_xref.cntrt_id = distinct_curr_run.cntrt_id
         )
SELECT ('Missing product') as DQ, xref.extrn_prod_id as extrn_prod_id , xref.extrn_prod_name as extrn_prod_name , xref.extrn_prod_attr_val_list as extrn_prod_attr_val_list , xref.prod_match_attr_list as prod_match_attr_list , xref.prod_prttn_code as prod_prttn_code , xref.prod_skid as prod_skid , xref.srce_sys_id as srce_sys_id , xref.cntrt_id as cntrt_id
  FROM xref
       JOIN loaded_prod ON xref.prod_skid = loaded_prod.prod_skid
       LEFT OUTER JOIN tier1_prod_dsdim prod_cur
          ON loaded_prod.prod_skid = prod_cur.prod_skid
       WHERE prod_cur.prod_skid IS  NULL
	   """
df_miss_prod = spark.sql(query3)

#Mail Sender

import smtplib
from email.mime.text import MIMEText
from email.mime.multipart import MIMEMultipart
from email.mime.base import MIMEBase
from email import encoders
# Setup port number and server name

smtp_port = 587                 # Standard secure SMTP port

lst_of_contacts = []

# Set up the email lists
email_from = "cpnotification.im@pg.com"

#email_list = ["Gopi.C@lntinfotech.com", "jagdish.sahu@lntinfotech.com", "poltoratskyi.i@pg.com"]
email_list = ["Gopi.C@lntinfotech.com"]


for c in lst_of_contacts:
  email_list.append(c)

pswd = dbutils.secrets.get('tp_dpf2cdl', 'cpnotification-password')

run_id = <<PROCESS_RUN_KEY>>
file_name = run_info[0]['file_name']
file_timestamp= run_info[0]['start_date_time']
report_name = f"tp_dvm_rprt_{run_id}_summary.xlsx"
rpt_path = '<@@PATH1@@>/tp_dvm_rpt/'

# name the email subject
subject = f"TP For Your Information DVM Validation Report for run {run_id}"

# Define the email function (dont call it email!)
def send_emails(email_list):

    for person in email_list:

        # Make the body of the email
        body = f"""

Validation summary:

Source File Name: {file_name} 
\nRun id: {run_id} 

Please find the attachments for detailed validation report

Regards,
Tradepanel Team    
        """
        print(body)
        # make a MIME object to define parts of the email
        msg = MIMEMultipart()
        msg['From'] = email_from
        msg['To'] = person
        msg['Subject'] = subject

        # Attach the body of the message
        msg.attach(MIMEText(body, 'plain'))

        # Define the file to attach
        filename_path = f"/dbfs/mnt/{rpt_path}/tp_dvm_rprt_{run_id}_summary.xlsx"

        # Open the file in python as a binary
        attachment= open(filename_path, 'rb')  # r for read and b for binary

        # Encode as base 64
        attachment_package = MIMEBase('application', 'octet-stream')
        attachment_package.set_payload((attachment).read())
        encoders.encode_base64(attachment_package)
        attachment_package.add_header('Content-Disposition', "attachment; filename= " + report_name)
        msg.attach(attachment_package)

        # Cast as string
        text = msg.as_string()

        # Connect with the server
        print("Connecting to server...")
        TIE_server = smtplib.SMTP(smtp_server, smtp_port)
        TIE_server.starttls()
        TIE_server.login(email_from, pswd)
        print("Succesfully connected to server")
        print()


        # Send emails to "person" as list is iterated
        print(f"Sending email to: {person}...")
        TIE_server.sendmail(email_from, person, text)
        print(f"Email sent to: {person}")
        print()

    # Close the port
    TIE_server.quit()


# Run the function
send_emails(email_list)",
